name: The Night of the Curse
description:
When the blood moon rises, Dracula's bats go out and feast. A perfect night out for vampire hunter Gunther and his trusty companion, beaver Oswald. Take control of both characters at the same time, each with there own mini game.  

-----Instructions-------------------
Desktop Players: use Z and X to play the game
Mobile Players: tap on the left or right side of the screen (not tested on WebGL build)

Multiplayer: Team up locally and control either Gunther or Oswald.

Tested on: Firefox

Best experience: Firefox, Fullscreen mode

----Credits------
My submission for the 2-buttons jam 2018
Music: Viktor Kraus - Approaching the Tower  (Open Game Art)
